docs.snippet: After the Super Bowl, the yoga community did the Internet equivalent of back flips when Seattle won....
docs.lead_paragraph: After the Super Bowl, the yoga community did the Internet equivalent of back flips when Seattle won.
docs.abstract: Yoga community takes to the Internet triumphantly following the Seattle Seahawk's Super Bowl victory, claiming that team's dedication to the practice was a decisive factor.

headline.main: Title for the Seahawks Is a Triumph for the Profile of Yoga
headline.print_headline: Title for the Seahawks Is a Triumph for the Profile of Yoga

docs.snippet: Fulham’s season reached a new low as the Premier League club was beaten at home by the League One struggler Sheffield United after extra time in an F.A. Cup fourth-round replay....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fulham’s season reached a new low as the Premier League club was beaten at home by the League One struggler Sheffield United after extra time in an F.A. Cup fourth-round replay.
docs.abstract: League-One straggler Sheffield United beats Fulham, 1-0, pushing team to new low; other soccer news noted.
